profile_positions.description:
Overall responsible for and manage each stage of M&A projects (both investment and divestment) for in Asia and Australia in all Siemens business Divisions (Digital Factory / Drive System/ Mobility/ Energy (Power and Gas)/ Smart Infrastructure) to ensure that transactions are in support of Siemens Corporate goals and strategies and are in line with corporate policies.

	Review and validate assumptions in the financial model and business case and sign off for proposals put forward to APMM Group Board
	Advise on accounting, financing and taxation matters for new acquired or start up terminals and responsible for establishing terminal implementation teams

	Develop financing need with terminal management and implementation team, and prepare information memorandum with APMM Group Finance and lead the team  to negotiate and conclude project financing to optimize terms & conditions
	Ensure corporate governance and regional risks are identified, assessed and managed
	Establish, update and maintain corporate and financial data per terminal
